  • Module code
  • czip

Source code for czip

import fire
from .cz import (
    Reader,
    Writer,
    test_difference,
    extract
)
from .allc import (AllC, generate_ssi, bed2cz,
                   merge_cz, extractCG, merge_cell_type)

__version__ = "0.1"



[docs]def main():
    fire.core.Display = lambda lines, out: print(*lines, file=out)
    fire.Fire(
        {
            "Writer": Writer,
            'Reader': Reader,
            'AllC': AllC,
            'bed2cz': bed2cz,
            'test_diff': test_difference,
            'generate_ssi': generate_ssi,
            'merge_cz': merge_cz,
            'merge_cell_type': merge_cell_type,
            'extract': extract,
            'extractCG': extractCG,
        }
	)


if __name__=="_main__":
	main()
